content: Yes, you can still find traditional Irish clothing in stores nowadays, especially in Ireland itself and in stores that specialize in Celtic and Irish products worldwide. Shops that sell traditional Irish clothing usually carry items like Aran knit sweaters, tweed jackets, capes, shawls, kilts, and Irish tweed hats. Some Irish fashion designers have even created modern variations of traditional Irish clothing, blending traditional motifs with contemporary materials and techniques. So, if you're interested in rocking traditional Irish clothing, there are many options available for you to choose from.
